sourcesContent: import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { Problem } from 'src/app/models/problem.model'; import { DataService } from 'src/app/services/data.service'; const DEFAULT_PROBLEM: Problem = Object.freeze({ id: 0, name: "", desc: "", difficulty: "Easy" }); @Component({ selector: 'app-new-problem', templateUrl: './new-problem.component.html', styleUrls: ['./new-problem.component.css'] }) export class NewProblemComponent { public difficulties = ["Easy", "Medium","Hard", "Super"]; newProblem: Problem = Object.assign({}, DEFAULT_PROBLEM); constructor(private data: DataService) {} addProblem(): void { this.data.addProblem(this.newProblem); this.newProblem = Object.assign({}, DEFAULT_PROBLEM); } }
